Subject: Re: Galvatron?
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

>    Preadking takes a less threatening stance, intent  on hearing what
>this Megatron has to say.   **Predaking** "What do you know of Galvatron? 
>What happened to our deranged and inefficient  leader?"

The waves of the beach were all that were audible, as Megatron turned the
question over in his mind. This was a much more effective solution than
fighting an potential ally. Galvatron, he thought, he knew that many off
his soldiers felt hatred for him, but it was a gamble when he spoke the
words, as the Predacons never showed this hatred towards him. Megatron
chose his words carefully, still standing tall, to try and show his power,
"Galvatron, is on this planet, and has tampered with me, and my destiny. I
need you Predaking, you need me. Together, we can rebuild what Galvatron
destroyed."
